code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useTeams}from'./../../context/TeamsContext';import{useFallbackImages}from'./../../context/FallbackImageContext';import'./css/Teams.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TeamFixtures=()=>{const{teams,filteredTeams,loading}=useTeams();const{images}=useFallbackImages();const navigate=useNavigate();if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-loading",children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-teams-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"teams-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Fixtures by Teams"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/teams",className:"view-all-link",children:"All"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"team-horizontal-scroll",children:filteredTeams.slice(0,9).filter(team=>team.national_team).sort((a,b)=>a.name.localeCompare(b.name)).map(team=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-team-card",onClick:()=>navigate("/teams/".concat(team.id,"/matches"),{state:{teamName:team.name}}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flag-circle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:team.image_path&&team.image_path.endsWith('cdn.sportmonks.com')?images.flag||'':team.image_path,alt:team.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:team.name})]},team.id))})]});};export default TeamFixtures;
